episodesJson.title: Public Broadcasting Act of 1967, part six
episodesJson.description: Discussion of Public Broadcasting Act of 1967 and a Ford Foundation report, "The Hidden Medium." Guests: Jerrold Sandler, executive director, National Educational Radio Network, and Herman W. Land, consultant.

creator.name: National Association of Educational Broadcasters, WAMU-FM (Radio station : Washington, D.C.)
